Articles.Content:
Hey guys

Just want to report in and say hi. I got kerbal yesterday after i played the demo to pieces and i dived right into the space station mods. I hope this will grow even further and become a major part of the game. Looking at all the progress with mods and stuff i\'m confident this game will eat up my time for months to come!

Here is my first try of a space station. Took me all day to get it into orbit of the Mun but its finally there! Nice and steady at 12 KM

I\'ll be working on more and better station but i\'m having a hard time with some parts and mods. They dont all work with 0.15

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
